channel.title: 爱5好 on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 爱5好 on Blog

item.title: Markdown基本语法
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: 风很大客服回答后方可
item.description: This is a two column theme with a navbar at the top and a sidebar to the right. The navbar contains links to major pages and links to social networks. The sidebar contains an about section, a section with the last 10 posts and finally a section which lists tags used across your site. Beautiful tables and images through purecss.
